channel.title: Comments on: If you ever feel useless, remember that these exist.
channel.description: Welcome to the home of Battlefield V! Your place for discussion, help, news, reviews, questions, screenshots, videos, gifs, and anything else BFV related! Battlefield V is developed by DICE and produced by EA. This subreddit is ran by dedicated fans of the series and has no affiliation with EA or DICE.

item.title: By: Hutchinator-Gaming
item.dc:creator: Hutchinator-Gaming
item.description: Rounds explode before they hit the beach. Angle is just terrible. Only good for the rare plane or two.
item.content:encoded: Rounds explode before they hit the beach. Angle is just terrible. Only good for the rare plane or two.

item.title: By: Takhar7
item.dc:creator: Takhar7
item.description:
Guessing it was a balancing issue - maybe the cave was too strongly defended when these things were actually effective, so they just pushed them out to face the damn beach?
Utterly useless, and a shame, because that wouild have been some really interesting, engaging tactical combat at that stage of the map
item.content:encoded:
Guessing it was a balancing issue – maybe the cave was too strongly defended when these things were actually effective, so they just pushed them out to face the damn beach?

Utterly useless, and a shame, because that wouild have been some really interesting, engaging tactical combat at that stage of the map

item.description: yeah it kinda sucks that those aren't better utilized. It would really change the dynamic of that map into a sorta king of hill tho.
